message.name: LM_TASK_SETOVERLAYICON
message.description: LiteStep sends this message when an application has called ITaskbarList3::SetOverlayIcon.

parameter.name: wParam
parameter.description: A handle to the window whose overlay icon is being set.

parameter.name: lParam
parameter.description: The new overlay icon, or NULL to clear the icon.

remarks.p: To receive this message, modules need to register for it by using LM_REGISTERMESSAGE.
